title: Gum Zaare Song Lyrics Kadavul Irukan Kumaru
stanzas:
Gum Zaare Song Lyrics Kadavul Irukan Kumaru
#GVPrakash #NaMuthukumar

gum zaare zaare zaare gumma
gum zaare zaare zaare
gummu gummuraan
gum zaare zaare zaare gumma
gum zaare zaare zaare
gummu gummuraan

eh konji pesuna
minji pesura
minji pesuna
konji pesura

konjam konjama sokka vaikura
kenji kekuren sutha vaikura
kannadi kannadi nenjil
kanveesi kal veesura
munnadi munnadi vandu
andha kalla vachi
tajmahal katta solluran

gum zaare zaare zaare gumma
gum zaare zaare zaare
gummu gummuraan (2)

eh konji pesuna
minji pesura
minji pesuna
konji pesura

konjam konjama sokka vaikura
kenji kekuren sutha vaikura

en thottathil poo poothathe
adhu un tholil malaiyaguma

en jannalin saaral mazhai
adhu maadhil kudikuma

singam onnu maanu rendu
theriyama selaikulla maatikichu
kaatukulla katcheri thaan
nee endha pakkam oodinalum
ichu ichu thaan

kannadi kannadi nenjil
kanveesi kal veesura
munnadi munnadi vandu
andha kalla vachi
tajmahal katta solluran

kaar kaalathil veyilai pol ival
sullunu sooda yethura
kodaiyila mazhaiya pol
iva sillunu mooda yethura

satta paiyil roja poova
chikkunu thaan enna vachika da
achedutha kuchi ice ah
enna vachi vachi pichi
pichi thinnukoyen da

kannadi kannadi nenjil
kanveesi kal veesura
munnadi munnadi vandu
andha kalla vachi tajmahal katta solluran

gum zaare zaare zaare gumma
gum zaare zaare zaare
gummu gummuraan
gum zaare zaare zaare gumma
gum zaare zaare zaare
gummu gummuraan..
